content:
# It appears that I am still trying to place the stone furnace at the same distant position of (-10, 5), which is beyond the maximum placement distance from my current position.
# 

# To resolve this, I need to either move closer to the position where I want to place the stone furnace or choose a different position that is within the allowed range.

# I will move to a position that is closer to the original stone furnace, then attempt to place the new stone furnace again.

move_to(Position(-5, 0))  # Move to a position that is closer to the original stone furnace.
